entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
